dialogue.context: seeing the spiral as mathematical entity
dialogue.text: The spiral beneath my feet isn't just a path—it's a living equation written in earth and intention.

visual_elements.evan_position: Standing on spiral, stick touching ground
visual_elements.symbolic_overlay: Path as formula, footsteps as calculations

psychological_notes: Evan experiences a profound shift in perception, recognizing the spiral as a conscious mathematical entity that computes through those who walk it. This represents a leap from personal transformation to cosmic participation—he's not just changing but becoming part of the equation that creates change.
philosophical_underpinning: Participatory mathematics where the calculator is part of the calculation
therapeutic_direction: Recognition of belonging to something larger than individual consciousness
